name: CFrogger!!
description:
carge gets bored so he decides he wants to meet Frogger so he can hang out in his lilypad.  Before he can do it though, he needs to get past these cars and trucks, and the alligators in the river!

Can you make it to the end and meet Frogger?

This game features flashing imagery.

If you are epileptic then please be cautious.

Controls:

Title Screen 

C - Inserts a coin.

1 - Chooses the 1 Player option/Starts The Game/Picks Player 1's character.

2 - Chooses the 2 Player option/Picks Player 2's character and starts the game.

General Controls

WASD - Control Player 1.

Q - Player 1 uses an item.

IJKL - Control Player 2.

U - Player 2 uses an item.

Credits:

Engine, Programming, Director - AtreyuGilbert

Music - Konami, Sega, Beeni

Beta Testers - arryorsomething, blootoothgaming

Background Artist - TSCOCT

Based on a character by 8BitAnt
